item.title: @elonmusk: You sent a letter to@elonmuskthreatening him with legal action if he dare host an interview with a c...
item.description: You sent a letter to@elonmuskthreatening him with legal action if he dare host an interview with a candidate for President of the United States. How dare you engage in such belligerence against our democratic elections and then claim *you* are now the victim. FAFO.

item.title: @elonmusk: ELON: â€œVIRTUE SIGNALING KILLSâ€ Elon gets serious when asked why he called Sen. Mark Kelly a "Traitor...
item.description: ELON: â€œVIRTUE SIGNALING KILLSâ€ Elon gets serious when asked why he called Sen. Mark Kelly a "Traitor" for pushing to send more U.S. aid and weapons to Ukraine. Heâ€™s calling out what he sees as moral theater around the war, arguing that thousands keep dying in trenches with â€œno movement in the linesâ€ and no realistic path to stopping it. Itâ€™s an uncomfortable take, but it cuts through slogans and forces the question many avoid: if thereâ€™s no plan to end it, what exactly are all these lives being lost for? â€œWe should have empathy for the thousands of people dying everyday in the trenches, for no movement in the lines, for the past two years thousands of people have died every week for nothing. I take great offense at those who put the appearance of goodness over the reality of it. Those who virtue signal and say we can't give into Russia, but have no solution to stopping thousands of kids dying every day. I have contempt for such people and I want to make that clear, because they're virtue signaling and their lack of a solution means that kids don't have a fatherâ€¦ It means parents lost a son. For what? Nothing." Source:@elonmusk, Fox News

item.title: @elonmusk: GDP up 4.3%, murders down 20%, suicides and opiate deaths down too, life expectancy recovered and ri...
item.description: GDP up 4.3%, murders down 20%, suicides and opiate deaths down too, life expectancy recovered and rising again, cancer survival up and disability down, bee populations coming back... It's been an incredible year. Merry Christmas everyone!
